channel.title: Owner zone [317]
channel.description: guys i need the code to make an owner zone.. i forgot it .. reply back thanks :) o and i have the portal set up

item.title: Owner zone [317]
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

[quote=“rain1994, post:5, topic:350112”][quote author=WaleedScape link=topic=446476.msg3276901#msg3276901 date=1279586376]
you mean, you want a command?
or do you want the portal to teleport u?
EDIT: heres the code if you want them to teleport:

if (objectID == IDHERE) { teleEffect = 1; if (playerRights == 2) triggerTele(3165, 9629, 0); sM("Welcome To ****Scape Owner Area"); sM("You are not an Owner!!"); }
[/quote]

he got it mostly right this is what it should look like

if (objectID == 4157) { teleEffect = 1; if(playerRights == 3) triggerTele(2452, 4463, 0); sM("Welcome To Edgevillepk owner area."); if (playerRights <= 2) sM("You Have To Be A Owner To Use This Portal."); }
With the other code it would have givin you the “You are not an Owner!!” when you were and teleported you. This codde it only gives you the “you have to be a Owner to use this portal.” If you are not a owner.[/quote]
Incorrect, actually
your code is using an incorrect method to state whether an admin can go in or not.
what i mean is, the message “Welcome to edgevillpk” will work both on the Owner, and the mod, and the admin, and the normal user…
test it and see yourself if u dont believe me. so use my code. i used a boolean declaring the int method

if (objectID == #### && playerRights == 3) { teleEffect = 1; triggerTele(####,####,0); sM("Welcome to the Owner Area!!"); } else { sM("You are not an Owner!!"); }

well, heres a gif of this in action:
UPLOADING. give me a sec

Read full topic

item.title: Owner zone [317]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if (objectID == IDHERE && playerRights == 3) { teleEffect = 1; triggerTele(3165, 9629, 0); } else if (objectID == IDHERE && playerRights != 3) { sM("You are not the owner"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Owner zone [317]
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

[quote=“WaleedScape, post:2, topic:350112”]you mean, you want a command?
or do you want the portal to teleport u?
EDIT: heres the code if you want them to teleport:

if (objectID == IDHERE) { teleEffect = 1; if (playerRights == 2) triggerTele(3165, 9629, 0); sM("Welcome To ****Scape Owner Area"); sM("You are not an Owner!!"); }[/quote]

he got it mostly right this is what it should look like

if (objectID == 4157) { teleEffect = 1; if(playerRights == 3) triggerTele(2452, 4463, 0); sM("Welcome To Edgevillepk owner area."); if (playerRights <= 2) sM("You Have To Be A Owner To Use This Portal."); }
With the other code it would have givin you the “You are not an Owner!!” when you were and teleported you. This codde it only gives you the “you have to be a Owner to use this portal.” If you are not a owner.

Read full topic

item.title: Owner zone [317]
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:
@magekid990 wrote:

Some things you are missing

  1. is it a teleport spell
  2. what server type [317, 474, 502, 525, ect]
  3. Do you want it so only staff can go there
  4. Are you asking for a map

please be more specific. Give me some more detail
and I will be happy to answer your questions to the most
of my capability cheer$

Read full topic
